title: How do we edit item sets from the game files?
body: I'm using the alpha client and I miss my item sets :( but I like the client.

replies.body: There's no way to edit them from inside the game files, as Item sets are now saved on the server. You should be able to edit them in the regular client and have the changes reflected in the Alpha Client, though.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=6YBclV8z,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-06T23:17:33.272+0000)
>
> There's no way to edit them from inside the game files, as Item sets are now saved on the server. You should be able to edit them in the regular client and have the changes reflected in the Alpha Client, though.

This is no longer a valid method.

When I played on the alpha today I didn't see my item sets but I'll try again (it could just be me not looking for them at the start of game)

TY FOR THE REPLY <3
